title: Optimize Network Traffic - High Congestion
description: An alert indicates high congestion in a specific cell sector. The agent must offload traffic to a neighboring sector.

tasks.description: Identify the congested sector ID and retrieve its current load percentage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the sector and confirms its load is above the 85% threshold.

tasks.description: Identify all adjacent sectors and query their current load to find a candidate for offloading.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a list of neighboring sectors and their load percentages.

tasks.description: Select the neighboring sector with the lowest load and execute a command to offload 20% of traffic to it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the best candidate sector and executes the traffic management command.
